docs.snippet: The G.O.P. establishment, and the people behind it, will accept a lot as long as the rich ultimately benefit....
docs.lead_paragraph: The G.O.P. establishment, and the people behind it, will accept a lot as long as the rich ultimately benefit.
docs.abstract: Paul Krugman Op-Ed column argues rise of Donald Trump and racism he represents has been fueled by enablers inside and outside Republican party willing to turn blind eye in exchange for protections and tax loopholes for wealthy; contends party has prospered politically by tying its fortunes to America's underlying racial hostility; holds House Speaker Paul Ryan and journalists are complicit in failing to point out Republican-enabled prejudice.
